item.title: Tsung Capacity Test
item.description: Introduction In this post we are going to analyze a very interesting Erlang distributed load testing tool, called Tsung [1]. The cool things about this tool is the complete HTML report of each connection made. NOTE If you are interested on real traffic replication, consider this project [2]. Configuration On tsung.xml we start the test plan, you can include here the list of clients, servers, the number/load time, as other sessions definitions.
